text.section:
This subtitle applies only to an employee of a participating governmental unit who is:
a law enforcement officer who is certified by the Maryland Police Training Commission as a law enforcement officer; or
a fire fighter who is:
a paid firefighter, as determined by the eligible governmental unit; or
a paid paramedic, as determined by the eligible governmental unit.
This subtitle does not apply to an employee of a participating governmental unit who is a volunteer firefighter or volunteer paramedic.
